charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed Clair and Leon
talking as [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was walking along the icy glaciers.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_0200_: Excellent battle! Let’s do it again sometime!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_0400_:
Yeah, I thought so, too! That was intense, but
you’re still not quite satisfied yet, are you.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0401_0600_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve come at
just the right moment!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0402_0800_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve come at
just the right moment!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_0900_:
You see, we’ve been challenging all sorts of
Trainers to Pokémon battles...
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_1000_:
but none of those battles have been able to fully
satisfy Eternatus.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_1100_:
No wonder! It has eternal reserves of energy,
after all!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0301_1200_: That must be tough to manage.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0401_1300_:
I’ve never thought of it like that...but I suppose
it is!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0402_1500_:
All I can do is keep finding opponents for us
to battle!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_1600_:
Eternatus won’t stop aiming to get stronger! If I
start slacking off, it’ll leave me in the dust!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_1700_:
This is just my little way of thanking it for
becoming my partner!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0401_1900_: Thanks, mate! Coming from you, that means a lot!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0302_2000_:
Have you decided who’ll be your
next opponent?
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0402_2100_:
Well, I’ve been trying to battle Trainers from
different backgrounds. There are a lot out there,
and they’re all strong in their own way.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2200_:
There are times when even that’s not enough to
satisfy Eternatus, though!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2300_: Whenever that happens, I call on Charizard!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2400_:
Those two can fight each other at full strength
because they’re both strong—and they’re rivals!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2500_:
When those two battle it out until they’re both
exhausted, only then is Eternatus satisfied!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2600_: But I can see that Eternatus has other plans today.
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2700_:
It may have sensed that you want to battle us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_2800_: Are you up for it, then?
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0401_3000_: That’s what I like to hear!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0302_3100_: I’m not gonna lose to you!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_0402_3200_: Haha! I don’t lose battles either!
charaepi_ch0247_10_dande/2301_1201_3300_: Right, then! Let’s have a champion time!
